thumb.title: Century 21 Calling [original song, Vocaloid, Allen/Haruka]
thumb.description: LyricsLook in the futureWe'll do telephonyI'll call your numberWill you answer me?See what you're doingBlock that call from meTrack where you're goingDark telephonySee in the futureWe'll tweak DNABlock all the freaks outKeep you cleanSwitchback blinding lightKeep you safe from meDark through a windowKeep you safe from meSee me in the futureKeep you calling meWorking on my postureKeeps you calling me homeSee us in the futureKeep avoiding meSee us in the futureKeep avoiding me oh
